ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas?? - Rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You don t play a cleric then. ... You don t play a paladin (cos they have to be a master smith in addition to do a very long and involved quest). ...
ygData.messageBody:
"Whitmore, Lance" wrote:
>
> 4. Rubi, Rubi, Rubi, personally I hate rubi.. hehe... I think its
> wonderful that they have added additional sets of armor, plus the fact its
> class specific. It would be a truly boring place if everyone was decked out
> in all red. I have to say the newly created no drop item quest for class
> specific armor, was a godsend. Lets look at the pluses:
>
> a. Armor tailored for a class with stats helping to further balance the
> classes overall.
You don't play a cleric then.

>
> b. Items for quest are no drop, therefore if you want the armor you pretty
> much have to loot the items yourself. This minimizes the camping by casters
> who are in it just for the money. I hate having to lower myself to
> trade/buy an item from some caster, that could never use it to being with,
> whom probably KS'd it from someone who really needed it.
You don't play a paladin (cos they have to be a master smith in addition
to do a very long and involved quest).

>
> c. Quest items are also spread out across the entire world forcing players
> to move about the zones.
Previously when I hunted in OOT I had what I wanted, now I have to
compete. So I am not a big fan of that.

>
> d. Each armor piece requires the actual spending of money, ill be it to the
> merchants :(, and this is good to increase the overall value of the
> platinum.
Sell Rubi in a shop, say the SolA Merchant, make it mega expensive. Too
easy.

>
> e. The quest are, from what I have experienced, quite sufficiently
> difficult. When teamed with a nice group they can be completed, however if
> you want to solo you better be ready to dish it out.. hehe

Ummmm. Cleric quests are completely pointless .. Sit in a burnt out
house in Kithicor for 8 hours, then go to a tree stump and sit there for
8 hours (BTW nothing to kill in kithicor to pass the time). Do some
running. Pay 250pp and get a pair of boots only slight better then
bronze or steelplate and worse then Rubi.

SK's and Pala's is much much worse.

Why is the chain wearing classes quest armour higher AC and stats then
some of plate wearing classes ?

Warrior : AC and stats better then rubi.
Ranger, Shaman, Rogue, bard : AC as good and stats better then rubi.
Clerics, palas and sk's : AC worse (and for cleric stats pretty useless
except for bracers).
